articles.title: What to know about the viral surrogacy lawsuit
articles.description:
“Perhaps a kind friend could have suggested to Bi that there were other explanations. Instead, Bi had a set of legal adversaries and a supportive echo chamber,” the “Wired” story reads.

The post What to know about the viral surrogacy lawsuit appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston's surrogacy lawsuit highlights legal challenges faced by intended parents and surrogates.
The case raises awareness about surrogacy rights and legal protections in Massachusetts.
Local residents may see changes in surrogacy laws and practices following the lawsuit.
